participant_1.background:
I have been going to the park a lot more often because my daughter loves to play there.
I keep to myself because I am afraid of being judged.
i like to read books.
I'm afraid of losing my cat, because he's my best friend and I don't know what I would do without him.
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house.
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
i like the movie godfather.
my favorite band is vv nation.
i always wear something purple.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hello! Mine is going great, thank you for asking! How about yours?
It's going well so far! I just got back from the park with my daughter.
That sounds like fun! I love going to the park.
Me too, it's a great place to relax and spend time with family.
I agree! Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Mittens. He's my best friend!
Aww, I love cats! They're so cute and cuddly.
He is! He's always there to greet me when I get home from work.
That's so sweet! I'm sure he loves you very much.
I think so too! He's always around me when I'm home.
That's great! I'm glad you have a furry friend to keep you company.
Thanks! Me too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and listen to music.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to read and listen to music too.
Me too! I'm a big fan of the Godfather movies.
Oh, I love those movies too! They're so good!
I know, right? They're some of my favorite movies of all time.
Mine too! What's your favorite band?
I like VV Nation. They're a great band.
I've never heard of them before. What kind of music do they play?
They're a rock band. They're pretty good.
I'll have to check them out sometime.
You should! I think you'll like them.
